CIPHER.0.cipherString: A platitude is simply a truth repeated till people get tired of hearing it.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword blocks.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Get all the fools on your side and you can be elected to anything.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword polls.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: Loss is nothing else but change,and change is Natures delight.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword shuttle.
